riskOfSpire:UsableRelic.NAME: Usable
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click a usable relic to use it. The cooldown of a usable relic decreases at the end of each turn. You may only have one usable relic at a time. Upon picking up a new usable relic, any previously held will be lost #rforever.
